description:
Pinta 3.0 open-source paint and drawing software is now available for download with GTK4 port, new effects, and many other changes. Here's what's new!

The post Pinta 3.0 Open-Source Paint Program Released with GTK4 Port, New Effects appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Pinta 3.0 Open-Source Paint Program Released with GTK4 Port, New Effects
